body:
We should do this. Although it may be a little tricky trying not to be
prescriptive wrt which tool to use (we shouldn't be).

On Mon, Jul 25, 2016 at 18:12 Josh Hoak <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> This is a documentation request for How to Write Go Code
> <https://golang.org/doc/code.html>.
>
> Given that the vendoring experiment is going away in 1.7, would it be
> possible to discuss vendoring and the vendor directory in the How to Write
> Go Code doc?
